## Testing

### For Shell Scripts

- [ ] Syntax validated with `bash -n script.sh`
- [ ] Tested on macOS <!-- version -->
- [ ] Tested with actual hardware (if applicable)
- [ ] No shellcheck warnings (or documented exceptions)

### For Documentation

- [ ] All links verified working
- [ ] Markdown renders correctly
- [ ] Spelling/grammar checked
- [ ] Cross-references updated

### For Hardware Compatibility

- [ ] Tested with documented configuration
- [ ] Test results documented in PR or linked issue

## Checklist

### General

- [ ] My changes follow the project's style and conventions
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my changes
- [ ] I have added/updated comments where necessary
- [ ] My changes don't introduce new warnings or errors

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] VERSION file updated (if applicable)
- [ ] FILE_INVENTORY.md updated (if files added/moved)

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] This PR contains breaking changes
  - If yes, describe impact: <!-- description -->
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained
